Sentencas: The parameter estimation using the traditional kinetic modeling of complex reaction systems will give incorrect results if the reaction mechanism contains a loop.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this work, a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model of the anodic electrochemical hydrogen oxidation reaction mechanism of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is formulated.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An iterative algorithm for estimating the reaction rate constants using the thermodynamically consistent model formulation is developed.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The kinetic parameters estimated using the proposed method gives a better fit to the experimental data.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Using the concept of 'Degree of rate control' it is found that the surface reactions may have a greater role in deciding the overall rate.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The proposed iterative parameter estimation algorithm developed in this work can also be adapted to other complex chemical and biochemical reaction networks for which the reaction rate constants need to be estimated using the experimental data.
Titulo: Development of a thermodynamically consistent kinetic model for reactions in the solid oxide fuel cell
